item.title: 为什么 "代币化 "资产会让银行对加密货币产生兴趣？
item.description: 加密货币是在 2008-2009 年金融危机的热潮中发明的，目的是为银行提供一种替代方案。比特币的发明者化名为中本聪（Satoshi Nakamoto），他们设想了一种不依赖于 "可信第三方 "的金融系统，因为他们认为这些第三方本来就不可信。取而代之的是，它将使用加密技术和名为区块链的分散式分类账来记录交易，并提供无可辩驳的所有权证明。加密技术的布道者们说，这将消除 "不信任"。【原文：Cryptocurrencies were invented in the heat of the 2008-2009 financial crisis to provide an alternative to banks. The inventors of Bitcoin, who went by the pseudonym Satoshi Nakamoto, envisioned a financial system that didn’t depend on “trusted third parties” that they said couldn’t be trusted in the first place. Instead, it would use cryptography and a decentralized ledger called a blockchain to record transactions and provide irrefutable proof of ownership. Crypto evangelists said this would de】

item.title: 交易员因降息押注而一年来最看空加元
item.description: 交易员对加元的看跌程度为一年来最高，因为他们预计加拿大央行决策者将在周三宣布降息决定时发出降息电报，甚至可能出人意料地推出宽松政策。【原文：Traders are the most bearish on the Canadian dollar in a year on expectations that Bank of Canada policymakers will telegraph interest-rate cuts when they announce their decision on Wednesday, or possibly even deliver a surprise easing.】

item.title: 千禧年关闭 Jason Feasey 的信贷交易，因为 Altice 的赌注变了味
item.description: 千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）正在清算信用交易专家杰森-费伊（Jason Feasey）的赌注，因为他对电信网络阿尔迪斯（Altice）的押注造成了这家对冲基金公司的损失。【原文：Millennium Management is liquidating wagers made by credit trading specialist Jason Feasey after his bets on telecom network Altice caused losses at the hedge fund firm.】

item.title: 意大利 Enel 发电厂发生爆炸，六人失踪
item.description: 据《共和国报》等意大利媒体报道，意大利北部 Enel SpA 公司的一座水电站发生爆炸，造成至少六人失踪，四人受伤。【原文：A hydro-power plant owned by Enel SpA in Northern Italy was hit by an explosion leaving at least six people missing and four injured, according to Italian media including La Repubblica.】

item.title: 阿根廷拉里奥哈债权人为债券拖欠问题备战
item.description: 阿根廷拉里奥哈省（La Rioja）的债权人在可能的债务谈判之前聘请了顾问，因为他们与官员们就超过 1600 万美元的债券付款问题争论不休。【原文：Creditors of Argentina’s La Rioja province tapped advisers ahead of potential debt talks as they quibble with officials over more than $16 million in bond payments.】

item.title: Diamondback 启动债券销售，为收购 Endeavor 提供资金支持
item.description: 钻石背能源公司（Diamondback Energy Inc）正在利用美国投资级市场发行债券，为其 260 亿美元收购 Endeavor Energy Resources LP 提供部分资金。【原文：Diamondback Energy Inc. is tapping the US investment-grade market with a bond offering to partly help fund its $26 billion takeover of Endeavor Energy Resources LP, joining other blue-chip companies capitalizing on robust investor demand to bring acquisition-related debt deals.】

item.title: 加拿大债务的 "隐蔽角落 "让投资者收获大涨
item.description: 在浮躁的信贷市场中寻求优势的投资者正在抢购一种不知名的加拿大债务，这种债务已经在债券中带来了一些最好的回报。【原文：Investors searching for an edge in frothy credit markets are snatching up an obscure type of Canadian debt that’s already delivered some of the best returns among bonds.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称美国企业发出信号：美联储是时候放宽政策了
item.description:
他建议收听财报电话会议，其中传达的信息清晰而响亮

。【原文：

Listen to earnings calls, he advises, and the message is loud and clear

】

item.title: 欧盟将对乌克兰免关税贸易延期制定更严格的规则
item.description: 欧盟更接近于延长与乌克兰的免关税贸易，同时收紧了食品进口规则，以安抚抗议农民对供应过剩的担忧。【原文：The European Union moved closer to extending its tariff-free trade with Ukraine, while tightening rules on food imports to placate protesting farmers’ concerns about oversupply.】

item.title: 印度航空公司因飞机技术人员计划罢工而遭受打击
item.description: 印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）的麻烦越来越多，飞机技术人员计划在本月晚些时候举行罢工，因为上周该公司的飞行员对工作过度和工资过低表示了担忧。【原文：Trouble for Air India Ltd. is mounting with aircraft technicians planning a strike later this month after its pilots voiced concerns last week about being overworked and underpaid.】

item.title: 欧洲国防股在两年涨势中下挫喘息
item.description: 高盛公司（Goldman Sachs）的分析师警告说，欧洲国防类股票最近的炙热涨势使其交易价格估值过高，因此周二出现重挫，创下近 18 个月来最糟糕的一天。【原文：European defense stocks fell heavily on Tuesday for their worst day in almost 18 months after Goldman Sachs analysts cautioned that the sector’s recent scorching rally had left it trading at elevated price valuations.】

item.title: 美中关系为何在南海日益紧张？
item.description: 几十年来，美国一直保障亚洲水域的航行自由，在海上巡逻，以维护任何主权国家都不应受到他国干涉的原则。中国正日益挑战这一现状，利用其日益增长的军事实力，对长期存在的领土要求进行施压。因此，华盛顿正着手重塑其数十年的地区联盟，以遏制北京的野心。台湾和南中国海的紧张局势最为明显。【原文：For decades, the US has guaranteed freedom of navigation in Asia’s waters, patrolling the seas with a view to maintaining the principle that no sovereign state shall suffer interference from another. China is increasingly challenging that status quo, using its growing military power to press long-standing territorial claims. So Washington is moving to reshape its decades-old regional alliances to keep Beijing’s ambitions in check. The tensions are most visible around Taiwan and in the South Chin】

item.title: 橡树树在求购者接触后停止 Banca Progetto IPO
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）旗下的 Banca Progetto SpA 已停止首次公开募股进程，因为该投资公司收到了一家潜在收购方对这家贷款公司的兴趣。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management’s Banca Progetto SpA has stopped the process for an initial public offering after the investment firm received interest from a prospective suitor for the lender.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安认为美联储和欧洲央行之间的分歧扩大将产生 "巨大影响
item.description: 越来越多的人预计，美联储未来几个月放松货币政策的力度将小于其同行，穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）也加入了这一行列。【原文：Add Mohamed El-Erian to the growing ranks of those who expect the Federal Reserve to ease monetary policy less than its peers in the coming months.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉之子称其利用已故创始人作为行贿的替罪羊
item.description: Trafigura 集团已故创始人克劳德-多芬（Claude Dauphin）的家人指责该贸易公司在其美国腐败案中将他作为 "替罪羊"，这是前所未有的公开斥责。【原文：The family of Trafigura Group’s late founder Claude Dauphin has accused the trading house of using him as a “scapegoat” in its US corruption case, in an unprecedented public rebuke.】

item.title: 诺福克南方公司将支付 6 亿美元和解俄亥俄州泄漏案
item.description: 根据法院文件，诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern Corp.【原文：Norfolk Southern Corp. said it will pay $600 million to settle a proposed class action lawsuit targeting the rail company over the 2023 train derailment in Ohio that spilled more than 1 million gallons of toxic chemicals and sickened residents, according to court filings.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦中央银行寻求打破两家贷款机构对支付的控制
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦中央银行希望通过在明年初推出一个新系统来促进交易的普及，从而削弱该国最大的两家贷款机构对支付的控制。【原文：Kazakhstan’s central bank wants to weaken the hold of the country’s two largest lenders over payments by introducing early next year a new system to facilitate transactions with universal access.】

item.title: 可可热潮蔓延，阿拉比卡咖啡在 18 个月高点附近保持稳定
item.description: 阿拉比卡期货变化不大，接近 2022 年 10 月以来的最高水平，因为退出可可市场的对冲基金现在正纷纷涌入咖啡市场。【原文：Arabica futures were little changed near their highest level since October 2022 as hedge funds exiting the cocoa market are now piling into coffee.】

item.title: 震撼韩国政坛的迪奥包风波
item.description: 一段据称是韩国第一夫人金健熙（Kim Keon Hee）获赠豪华手提包的秘密录制视频在今年早些时候削弱了公众对尹锡烈总统的支持，并可能在选民周三投票选举新一届议会时影响他们的想法。这是围绕这位在竞选期间明显缺席的第一夫人的一系列争议中的最新一起。尹炳世在今年 2 月的一次电视采访中谈到了这一争议，他说，在竞选期间，第一夫人明显缺席了竞选活动。【原文：A secretly recorded video purporting to show South Korean first lady Kim Keon Hee being gifted a luxury handbag dented public support for President Yoon Suk Yeol earlier this year, and may weigh on the minds of voters when they cast ballots for a new parliament on Wednesday. It’s the latest in a string of controversies surrounding the first lady who was conspicuously absent during the election campaign. Addressing the controversy in a TV interview in February, Yoon said the presentation of the d】

item.title: Aareal 将美国办事处不良贷款减少 5 亿欧元
item.description: 德国商业银行（Aareal Bank AG）表示，该行将美国写字楼不良贷款减少了约 5 亿欧元（5.43 亿美元），以控制房地产市场恶化带来的影响。【原文：Aareal Bank AG said it reduced the volume of non-performing US office loans by about €500 million ($543 million) as it moves to contain the fallout from deteriorating real estate markets.】

item.title: 丰业银行计划进军巴西地方债务市场，增强团队实力
item.description: 丰业银行计划在巴西承销当地债券，并在当地提供现金管理服务，以拓展其在拉丁美洲最大国家的业务。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia plans to underwrite local bonds in Brazil and offer cash-management services there as it expands in Latin America’s biggest nation.】

item.title: 较小规模的每周销售吸引了大量投标，南非债券上涨
item.description: 本周二，在南非政府缩小规模的每周债券销售吸引了投资者的强劲需求之后，南非本币债券成为新兴市场中表现最好的债券。【原文：South African local-currency bonds were the best performing in emerging markets on Tuesday, after the government’s reduced-size weekly debt sale drew strong demand from investors.】

item.title: 据说制药商斯达将与收购公司洽谈 80 亿欧元的出售计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Stada Arzneimittel AG 公司已开始与潜在买家洽谈，这家德国仿制药生产商的所有者正在寻求一项可能的出售计划，该计划可能使该公司的价值达到约 80 亿欧元（87 亿美元）。【原文：Stada Arzneimittel AG has begun talking to potential buyers as the German generic-drug maker’s owners pursue a possible sale that could value the company at about €8 billion ($8.7 billion), people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 欧盟通过风能调查加大对中国绿色技术的压力
item.description: 欧盟加大了对中国清洁技术投资的压力，因为在欧盟努力将集团转变为绿色经济的过程中，中国的清洁技术投资可能会挤走其本地供应商。【原文：The European Union ramped up pressure on Chinese clean-tech investments potentially squeezing out its local suppliers amid EU efforts to transform the bloc into a green economy.】

item.title: 露得清关闭洛杉矶办事处并裁员
item.description: 随着母公司 Kenvue Inc. 将业务整合到新泽西州，露得清将永久关闭其洛杉矶办事处。【原文：Neutrogena is permanently closing its Los Angeles office as parent Kenvue Inc. consolidates operations to New Jersey.】

item.title: 解决中国太阳能产能过剩的办法是市场力量而非空谈
item.description:
与任何商品的繁荣和萧条一样，无论外国官员怎么说，供应过剩都意味着生产商的眼泪。【原文：

As with any commodity boom and bust, excess supply will mean tears for producers, whatever foreign officials say. 

】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司的影响开始波及债券市场同行
item.description: 随着泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd. ）的危机将人们的目光转向该行业的债务负担，英格兰各地的水务公司都感受到了债券市场的压力。【原文：Water utilities across England are feeling pressure in the bond market as the crisis at Thames Water Ltd. turns attention to the industry’s debt burdens.】

item.title: 梅洛尼官员认为意大利债务上升，但经济增长仍在维持
item.description: 意大利有望在 2024 年实现超过大多数预测的经济增长，但根据政府的最新展望，意大利的债务负担将在未来几年呈上升趋势。【原文：Italy is on track to achieve 2024 growth exceeding most forecasts but its debt burden is now set to trend higher for years to come, according to the government’s latest outlook.】

item.title: 波罗的海原油出口减少，俄罗斯原油出口回落
item.description:
普里莫尔斯克和乌斯季卢加的发货量比前一周减少了五分之一

。【原文：

Shipments from Primorsk and Ust-Luga were down by one-fifth from the previous week

】

item.title: 埃及提出要求后，延误的小麦船驶离俄罗斯港口
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在俄罗斯农业监管机构与一家重要谷物贸易商之间的争执导致两艘装载小麦的船只停航后，埃及外交部介入了此事。【原文：Egypt’s Foreign Ministry stepped in after a spat between Russia’s agriculture regulator and a key grain trader held up two ships carrying wheat, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
